homepage-aipublish-title: Translate a complete JSON file in a few seconds
homepage-aipublish-info-title: Translate JSON files with the push of a button.
homepage-aipublish-info-sub-title: Translate entire JSON files at once using our tool powered by ChatGPT
homepage-aipublish-info-des: With our tool, it's possible to translate (large) JSON files all at once into 260+ language. The translation is done using ChatGPT, and with our tool, you don't need to split files into separate parts.
homepage-aipublish-edit-title: Translate entire JSON files at once, within seconds
homepage-aipublish-edit-des: With the JSON translator, you can translate (large) JSON files all at once without the need to split a file into multiple parts. Simply translate a JSON file in one go.
homepage-aipublish-edit-item1: High-quality translation through the use of ChatGPT
homepage-aipublish-edit-item2: You can translate entire files all at once
homepage-aipublish-edit-item3: It can't get any faster, just 5 seconds for a translated JSON file
homepage-aipublish-trans-des: With our tool, you can translate JSON files into 260+ languages, ensuring the highest achievable translation quality through the use of ChatGPT
homepage-aipublish-trans-item1: A translated JSON file in nearly all languages
homepage-aipublish-trans-item2: You can opt for one-time translations and pay per file
homepage-aipublish-trans-item3: If you want to translate JSON files regularly, opt for the unlimited membership
homepage-aipublish-price-des: We enable JSON translations for anyone dealing with website and app translation and localization.

faq-item-description2: Our tool supports translations into any languages (260+), enabling global translation.
faq-item-description3: Translation of a JSON file happens in just a few seconds, providing you with quick access to the translated content

faq-item-description5: Yes, our tool utilizes ChatGPT and ensures high-quality translations with high accuracy. Better then Google Translate and Deepl

faq-item-description10: Yes, we prioritize the security of your data and implement strict measures to protect it. Your files are not stored on our server and are promptly removed from our systems immediately after translation. (It's crucial to ensure you save your translated files securely on your end)

This Cookie Statement explains how JSON: This Cookie Statement explains how JSON Translator uses cookies and similar technologies when you use the JSON Tool. By using the JSON Tool, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this statement.
Cookies are small text files that are st: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile phone) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work or to improve their efficiency, as well as to provide information to website owners.
3.1 Essential Cookies: These cookies are: These cookies are necessary for the JSON Tool to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.
3.2 Analytics Cookies: We use analytics: We use analytics cookies to collect information about how users interact with the JSON Tool. This helps us analyze and improve the performance and user experience.
3.3 Marketing Cookies: Marketing cookies: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user.
4.1 Session Cookies: These are temporary: These are temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser.
4.2 Persistent Cookies: These cookies re: These cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them.
You can control and/or delete cookies as: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your device, and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences each time you visit the JSON Tool.
We may use third-party services that may: We may use third-party services that may set cookies on our behalf. These cookies are subject to the respective privacy policies of these third-party providers.
We may update this Cookie Statement to r: We may update this Cookie Statement to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify users of any significant changes through the JSON Tool.
If you have any questions, concerns, or: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Cookie Statement, please contact us at info@jsontranslator.io
